bioAsHtml: I am co-founder of Camunda. But foremost I am software developer and consultant. I am doing BPM for more than 10 years now and committed in various Open Source Process Engines over time. I coached countless BPM/workflow projects and I got totally passionate about the whole "developer friendly BPM" story. When I have some spare time I give talks at conferences or write articles and books (e.g. our Real-Life BPMN book).
